products.title: Azimut 77 Yacht
products.description: Luxurious 77-foot motor yacht with state-of-the-art amenities, spacious master suite, and capacity for 8 guests plus crew. Features advanced navigation systems, entertainment areas, and outdoor decks with panoramic views.

products.title: Gulfstream G650ER
products.description: Ultra-long-range business jet with non-stop intercontinental capabilities. Premium cabin with luxury seating, fully equipped galley, shower, and private bedroom. Maximum 16 passengers in high-density configuration.

products.title: Beverly Hills Mansion
products.description: Spectacular 12,000 sq ft contemporary mansion in prime Beverly Hills location. Features 7 bedrooms, 10 bathrooms, chef's kitchen, wine cellar, home theater, infinity pool, and smart home automation throughout.

products.title: Private Caribbean Island
products.description: Exclusive 45-acre private island in the Caribbean with pristine beaches, lush tropical vegetation, and full infrastructure. Includes main residence, staff quarters, helipad, marina, and desalination plant for complete self-sufficiency.

products.title: Benetti 164 Superyacht
products.description: Italian-built 164-meter superyacht combining elegance and performance. Accommodates 36 guests and 54 crew members across multiple decks. Features swimming pool with ocean view, spa, restaurant, and multiple lounges with world-class design.

products.title: Bombardier Global 7500
products.description: Ultra-modern ultra-long-range jet with 5,000+ nautical mile capability. Signature cabin with innovations including the largest windows in business aviation and an integrated in-flight connectivity system.

products.title: Miami Beach Penthouse
products.description: Stunning 15-story oceanfront penthouse with 360-degree views of the Atlantic. Features 8,500 sq ft of living space, rooftop infinity pool, smart glass systems, and direct beach access with private cabana.

products.title: Maldives Luxury Island Resort
products.description: Exclusive all-inclusive island resort with 50 overwater villas and beachfront bungalows. Includes world-class spa, Michelin-trained chef services, water sports facilities, and state-of-the-art diving center.

products.title: Lurssen 164 Explorer Yacht
products.description: German-engineered 164-meter explorer superyacht built for expedition and luxury travel. Features advanced ice-class hull, helicopter deck, submarine garage, and zero-speed stabilizers for unmatched comfort in any sea condition.

products.title: Embraer Lineage 1000E
products.description: Brazilian-made large-cabin business jet with exceptional range and comfort. Largest cabin in its class with flexible seating, dedicated crew area, full-size galley, and luxury finishes throughout.

products.title: Aspen Ski Chalet
products.description: Premier alpine estate with ski-in/ski-out access. Features 8 bedrooms, 10 fireplaces, heated swimming pool, spa, wine cellar, and panoramic views of Maroon Bells. Perfect for winter sports enthusiasts.

products.title: Seychelles Archipelago Estate
products.description: Rare multi-island private estate in the Indian Ocean with pristine beaches and turquoise waters. Includes multiple luxury residences, private yacht marina, helipad, and exclusive access to untouched island sanctuaries.
